name: warp-easy-login-browser-extension
description: This extension allows you to sign in to warpcast.com without having to use a mobile device.

scripts.build: yarn compose-inject && yarn compile-inject && vite build
scripts.release: yarn config set version-tag-prefix warp-easy-login-browser-extension@v &&  yarn config set version-git-message 'warp-easy-login-browser-extension@v%s' && yarn version --patch && yarn postversion
scripts.pub: yarn build && yarn release && yarn create-release
